snippet: Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo announced on Wednesday that he had pardoned two men, one who had been convicted in a drug case and another who was convicted of robbery.
abstract: New York Gov Andrew M Cuomo says he has pardoned Antonio Argibay and Alvaro Khalil Cumberbatch, saying men deserve second chance; granting of pardons marks second time Cuomo has exercised his clemency since taking office in 2011.
lead_paragraph: Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo announced on Wednesday that he had pardoned two men, one who had been convicted in a drug case and another who was convicted of robbery.

headline.main: Cuomo, Using Pardon Power, Gives Pair a ‘Second Chance’
headline.print_headline: For Second Straight Year, Cuomo Uses Pardon Power
